KHOP is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Root]] signifying harbour. <ref name=":0"> {{LR|P3}}, p. 364</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]] <ref name=":0" />
**hópa ''n.'' "haven, harbour, small landlocked bay"
**hopasse ''n.'' "harbourage"
*[[Noldorin Quenya]] <ref name=":0" />
**hûb ''n.'' "haven, harbour, small landlocked bay"
**hobas ''n.'' "harbourage"
